## Checklist

- [ ] I ran `shellcheck` on any modified shell scripts
- [ ] New sound files include a `DISCLAIMER.md` with source attribution
- [ ] Changes are compatible with bash 3.2+ (no associative arrays)
- [ ] Works on macOS (tested or designed for compatibility)
- [ ] README updated if adding a new sound pack, theme, or flag
- [ ] No new dependencies beyond bash, python3, tmux, git
